text: Metro Wierzbno is a station on Line M1 of the Warsaw Metro, located in the Wierzbno neighbourhood, from which it derives its name. The station is in the Mokotów district of Warsaw. The station was opened on 7 April 1995 as part of the inaugural stretch of the Warsaw Metro, between Kabaty and Politechnika. ==References== ==External links== Category:Warsaw Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 1995 Category:Mokotów Category:1995 establishments in Poland
title: Wierzbno metro station
